game.name: The Last Nordic Tribe
game.shortDescription: The Last Nordic Tribe is a retro-style RPG game with survival elements, set in the brutal world shaped by the “Little Ragnarök”. Face hunger, frost, enemies, and fate itself as you journey through the dark beginnings of the Middle Ages. The fate of the North rests in your hands-will you survive?
